effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power and type depend on the held berry.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power and type depend on the held berry.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power and type depend on the held berry.
